channel.title: Snowstorms = Bad things
channel.description:
Last night our power went out, and my Xbox got shot and so did my computer thing ( Big rectangle box that you turn the whole computer on, not continuely thinking right now ). My dad called it in and we cannot get the part for 10 days, sucks. Now I have to redownload everything, like all Java files, and by the way, I am using my old piece of crap box, [lol..Help me?] This computer is really slow ATM and lol whenever I scroll it blurs out for a couple seconds. :S
Please post something I can read and something nice and positive.
Thanks.

item.title: Snowstorms = Bad things
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:8, topic:167279”]I feel so much sympathy for you.

It’s so beautiful in Florida, no bad weather, hell in fact, I’m playing my xbox right now!![/quote]

yes it is beautiful in florida… btw where do you live in fl?

Read full topic

item.title: Snowstorms = Bad things
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:9, topic:167279”]Snowstorms are good. Removal of electricity = better world tbh.[/quote]To say the least. If anything has ruined the world, it’s technology.
